trans-unit.source: The abstract base class for security token handlers.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖處理常式的抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler> class is the base class from which all security token handlers derive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler>類別是從所有安全性權杖處理常式所衍生的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: A security token handler is responsible for:
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖處理常式負責：

trans-unit.source: Validating security tokens (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>) of the type it is designed to process and packaging the claims contained in the token into a <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> object.
trans-unit.target: 驗證安全性權杖 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>) 它設計來處理程序和封裝到權杖中包含宣告型別的<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>物件。

trans-unit.source: Serializing and deserializing security tokens of the type it is designed to process.
trans-unit.target: 序列化和還原序列化安全性權杖，其設計目的是要處理的類型。

trans-unit.source: Serializing and deserializing key identifier clauses (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>) that refer to tokens of the type it is designed to process to and from `<wsse:SecurityTokenReference>` elements.
trans-unit.target: 序列化和還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>)，是指其設計目的是要處理的類型的權杖`<wsse:SecurityTokenReference>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Creating security tokens from a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor> object passed by implementations of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全性權杖從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor>的實作方式所傳遞物件<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creating key identifier clauses from a security token for implementations of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class.
trans-unit.target: 從安全性 token 的實作來建立金鑰識別碼子句<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>類別。

trans-unit.source: Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) ships the following security token handlers out of the box:
trans-unit.target: Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 會隨附現成提供的下列安全性權杖處理常式：

trans-unit.source: Most of these classes expose additional members that implement functionality that is specific to the processing of the tokens for which the class is designed.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的這些類別會公開實作的特定設計類別語彙基元的處理功能的其他成員。

trans-unit.source: In many cases it may be better to derive from one of these classes rather than directly from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: 在許多情況下可能是較好的方式衍生自這些類別，而不是直接從一個<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler>類別。

trans-unit.source: A security token handler can be added or removed from a token handler collection by specifying the [<add>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md), [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md), or [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/clear.md) elements under the [<securityTokenHandlers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md) element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 可以加入或從權杖處理常式集合中移除指定安全性權杖處理常式[<新增>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md)， [<移除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md)，或[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/clear.md)下的項目[ <securityTokenHandlers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md)組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration> object that contains the configuration settings for the handler collection can be accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property and the handler collection that the token handler is a member of can be accessed from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration>物件，其中包含處理常式集合的組態設定可以透過存取<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>屬性和處理常式的集合，權杖處理常式的成員可以存取從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A> method to process any custom configuration elements that your handler takes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>方法來處理您的處理常式會採用任何自訂組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler> class exposes several other properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler>類別會公開數個其他屬性和方法。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the functionality that you choose to implement, you may override some or all of these members.
trans-unit.target: 根據您選擇實作的功能，您可能會覆寫部分或所有這些成員。

trans-unit.source: You must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.TokenType%2A> property and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.GetTokenTypeIdentifiers%2A> method to provide the WIF infrastructure with information about the type of security token that your class is designed to process.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.TokenType%2A>屬性和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.GetTokenTypeIdentifiers%2A>設計成處理一般的方法，以提供 WIF 基礎結構的安全性權杖的類別類型的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Validation, serialization, and deserialization functionality is exposed through properties or methods that indicate whether the handler can perform a specific function combined with the method or methods that implement the functionality.
trans-unit.target: 驗證、 序列化和還原序列化功能會公開屬性或方法，以指出此處理常式是否可以執行結合的方法或實作功能之方法的特定函式。

trans-unit.source: The following list pairs the properties or methods that indicate functionality with the methods that implement that functionality:
trans-unit.target: 下列清單配對的屬性或方法，以指出實作該功能的方法與功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanValidateToken%2A> property and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A> method: Validates a token and packages the claims contained in the token into a <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanValidateToken%2A>屬性和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A>方法： 驗證權杖，並封裝到權杖中包含的宣告<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanWriteToken%2A> property and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A> methods: Token serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanWriteToken%2A>屬性和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>方法： 語彙基元序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadToken%2A> methods and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A> methods: Token deserialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadToken%2A>方法和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A>方法： 權杖還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method: Deserializing key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A>方法和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A>方法： 還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.WriteKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method: Serializing key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause%2A>方法和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.WriteKeyIdentifierClause%2A>方法： 序列化金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CreateToken%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CreateSecurityTokenReference%2A> methods are called from the pipeline in implementations of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CreateToken%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CreateSecurityTokenReference%2A>方法從管線中的實作呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.DetectReplayedToken%2A> method is called by the WIF infrastructure to determine whether the specified token has already been received.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.DetectReplayedToken%2A> WIF 基礎結構，以判斷是否已收到指定的語彙基元會呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: By default this method returns `false`, which indicates that the token has not already been received.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回預設`false`，這表示，語彙基元不已接收。

trans-unit.source: You can override the method and provide logic to detect replayed tokens.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫方法，並提供邏輯，可偵測重新執行的權杖。

trans-unit.source: The code examples in all of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler> topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample.
trans-unit.target: 所有的程式碼範例<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler>主題摘錄自`Custom Token`範例。

trans-unit.source: This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。

trans-unit.source: For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following XML shows how to add the SWT token handler to the token handlers collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列 XML 會示範如何將 SWT 權杖處理常式加入至權杖處理常式集合。

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別中的建構函式呼叫，以將 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> 類別初始化。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element.
trans-unit.target: 位於開始項目的 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: The reader should not be advanced by this method.
trans-unit.target: 不應透過這個方法將讀取器向前移。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the XML element referred to by the specified XML reader is a key identifier clause that can be deserialized by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示指定的 XML 讀取器所參考的 XML 項目是否為此執行個體可還原序列化的金鑰識別項子句。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadKeyIdentifierClause(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method can read the element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadKeyIdentifierClause(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> 方法可以讀取項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns `false` to indicate that the key identifier clause cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回`false`來指示將無法讀取金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: A derived class checks the element that the reader is referring to in order to determine whether the instance can deserialize a key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別會檢查讀取器以判斷執行個體是否可以還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句所參考的項目。

trans-unit.source: This is typically accomplished through a call to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.IsStartElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the appropriate element and namespace strings specified.
trans-unit.target: 通常這是透過呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.IsStartElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法與指定的適當項目和命名空間字串。

trans-unit.source: If you override <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A>, you must also override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method to provide the logic to deserialize the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A>，您也必須覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A>方法以提供還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified token can be deserialized as a token of the type processed by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示指定的語彙基元是否可還原序列化為此執行個體所處理的型別語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The token string to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的語彙基元字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified string can be deserialized as a token of the type processed by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示指定的字串是否可還原序列化為此執行個體所處理的型別語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken(System.String)" /> method can read the element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken(System.String)" /> 方法可以讀取項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must also override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to provide the logic to deserialize the token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您也必須覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以提供邏輯以還原序列化語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at a start element.
trans-unit.target: 位於開始項目的 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: The reader should not be advanced by this method.
trans-unit.target: 不應透過這個方法將讀取器向前移。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the XML element referenced by the specified XML reader can be read as a token of the type processed by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示指定的 XML 讀取器所參考的 XML 項目是否可讀取為此執行個體所處理的型別語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method can read the element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> 方法可以讀取項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: A derived class checks the element that the reader is referring to in order to determine whether the instance can deserialize a security token.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別會檢查讀取器以判斷執行個體是否可以還原序列化的安全性語彙基元所參考的項目。

trans-unit.source: This is typically accomplished through a call to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.IsStartElement%2A> method with the appropriate element and namespace strings specified.
trans-unit.target: 通常這是透過呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.IsStartElement%2A>方法與指定的適當項目和命名空間字串。

trans-unit.source: If you override <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A>, you must also override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to provide the logic to deserialize the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A>，您也必須覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以提供還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句的邏輯。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadToken%2A>方法，以判斷是否可以處理常式所讀取的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the handler supports validation of security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出處理常式是否支援驗證安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the class is capable of validating security tokens; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別能夠驗證安全性權杖，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To implement validation in a derived class, override this property to return `true` and override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A> method to implement the validation logic.
trans-unit.target: 若要在衍生類別中實作驗證，請覆寫此屬性以傳回`true`並覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A>方法來實作驗證邏輯。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanValidateToken%2A>屬性，指出自訂處理常式可以驗證權杖。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to be checked.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的索引鍵識別項子句。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified key identifier clause can be serialized by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體是否能夠序列化指定的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key identifier clause can be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以序列化金鑰識別碼子句，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If you override <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause%2A>, you must also override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.WriteKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method to provide the logic to serialize the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause%2A>，您也必須覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.WriteKeyIdentifierClause%2A>方法以提供序列化金鑰識別碼子句的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the handler can serialize security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出處理常式是否可序列化安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the class is capable of serializing tokens; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別能夠序列化權杖，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To implement serialization in a derived class, override this property to return `true` and override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A> methods to implement the serialization logic.
trans-unit.target: 若要在衍生類別中實作序列化，覆寫此屬性以傳回`true`並覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>方法來實作序列化邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanWriteToken%2A> property to indicate that a custom handler can serialize tokens.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanWriteToken%2A>屬性，指出自訂處理常式可以序列化語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration" /> object that provides configuration for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定為目前執行個體提供組態的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The configuration object for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行個體的組態物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property is typically set by the configuration infrastructure from the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md) element in the configuration file during application start up.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>屬性通常由設定基礎結構，從設定[ <securityTokenHandlerConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md)啟動期間的應用程式組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, you use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property to access configuration settings; for example, the issuer name registry to use in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A> method can be accessed from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.IssuerNameRegistry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中，您使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>以存取組態設定的屬性; 例如，若要使用的簽發者名稱登錄<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A>方法可以存取從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.IssuerNameRegistry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>組態物件屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token handler collection that contains the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含目前執行個體的權杖處理常式集合。

trans-unit.source: The token handler collection that contains the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 包含目前執行個體的權杖處理常式集合。

trans-unit.source: When the token handler is added to a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection> instance, this property is automatically set.
trans-unit.target: 當權杖處理常式加入<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection>執行個體，這個屬性會自動設定。

trans-unit.source: The token for which the reference is to be created.
trans-unit.target: 要為其建立參考的權杖。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an attached reference should be created; <see langword="false" /> if an unattached reference should be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果應建立附加的參考，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果應建立為未附加的參考，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates the security token reference for tokens processed by that class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立該類別所處理之權杖的安全性權杖參考。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called by a security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常是由安全性權杖服務 (STS) 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A key identifier clause that references the specified token.
trans-unit.target: 參考所指定語彙基元的索引鍵識別項子句。

trans-unit.source: By default this method throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 依預設這個方法會擲回<xref:System.NotImplementedException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes override this method to return a key identifier clause (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>) that can be used to create a `<wsse:SecurityTokenReference>` element for the specified token.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別覆寫此方法以傳回金鑰識別碼子句 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>) 可以用來建立`<wsse:SecurityTokenReference>`指定語彙基元的項目。

trans-unit.source: Called from implementations of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class.
trans-unit.target: 從實作呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>類別。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>不需要使用，除了在建立自訂安全性權杖服務時。

trans-unit.source: When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 當安全性權杖服務傳回安全性權杖時，所發出的安全性權杖會包含已附加及未附加之安全性權杖的參考。

trans-unit.source: Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references reference security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 附加的參考會參考包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖，而未附加的參考則會參考未包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 這些參考通常會證明這些發出之安全性權杖的真實性。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CreateSecurityTokenReference%2A> method to create a key identifier clause from the specified token.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CreateSecurityTokenReference%2A>方法來建立金鑰識別碼子句，從指定的語彙基元。

trans-unit.target: 要從其中建立權杖的安全性權杖描述元。

trans-unit.target: 先設定權杖描述元的屬性，然後呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請使用指定的權杖描述元建立安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖服務 (STS) 會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: A security token that matches the properties of the token descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 符合權杖描述元之屬性的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.target: 依預設這個方法會擲回<xref:System.NotImplementedException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The token to check for replay.
trans-unit.target: 要針對重新執行進行檢查的權杖。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, throws an exception if the specified token is detected as being replayed.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，如果指定的權杖被偵測為被重新執行，則擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作不做任何動作。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should throw a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenReplayDetectedException> if the token has already been used.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別應該擲回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenReplayDetectedException>如果使用此語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) provides the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenReplayCache> class from which replay caches may be derived and the [<tokenReplayCache>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/tokenreplaycache.md) configuration element, which can be used to configure the replay cache used by token handlers in an application; however, the exact implementation of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.DetectReplayedToken%2A> method is up to the designer of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 提供<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenReplayCache>快取可能會衍生自哪一個重新執行的類別和[ <tokenReplayCache> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/tokenreplaycache.md)組態項目，可用來設定重新執行應用程式; 中的語彙基元處理常式所使用的快取不過，實際的實作<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.DetectReplayedToken%2A>方法是由衍生類別的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the set of URIs that are used in requests to identify a token of the type processed by the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回在要求中使用的 URI 集合，識別衍生類別所處理的權仗型別。

trans-unit.source: The set of URIs that identify the token type that this handler supports.
trans-unit.target: 會識別這個處理常式支援的語彙基元型別的 URI 集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the token processed by the current instance is accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.TokenType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>處理的目前執行個體的語彙基元存取透過<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.TokenType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.GetTokenTypeIdentifiers%2A> method returns the set of acceptable identifiers that can be used in messages to refer to the token type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.GetTokenTypeIdentifiers%2A>方法會傳回一組可用的可接受識別碼來參考語彙基元類型的訊息中。

trans-unit.source: For example, the URI value used in the `<wst:TokenType>` element under the `<wst:RequestSecurityToken>` element to request a specific kind of token (represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.TokenType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in the object model).
trans-unit.target: URI 值中的使用，例如`<wst:TokenType>`項目底下`<wst:RequestSecurityToken>`要求特定種類的語彙基元的項目 (由<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage.TokenType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件模型中的屬性)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.GetTokenTypeIdentifiers%2A>方法以傳回自訂權杖的權杖類型識別項。

trans-unit.source: The configuration XML elements.
trans-unit.target: 組態 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: Each node in the list is of type <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 清單中的每個節點的型別為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，從 XML 載入自訂組態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A> method is called by the configuration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>設定基礎結構會呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the token handler’s [<add>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md) element from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，`nodelist`將包含權杖處理常式的最上層的子元素[<新增>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md)從組態檔項目。

trans-unit.source: Each of these may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class.
trans-unit.target: 每一種可能，接著，會包含屬性或子項目，視您為您衍生的類別定義組態結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會擲回<xref:System.NotImplementedException>。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in your derived class to enable initialization of your security token handler from a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫此方法以啟用您的安全性權杖處理常式從組態檔的初始化衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the XML to be deserialized into the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 位於要還原序列化為金鑰識別項子句之 XML 開始項目的 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes the XML referenced by the specified XML reader to a key identifier clause that references a token processed by the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將指定 XML 讀取器所參考的 XML 還原序列化為參考該衍生類別所處理之權仗的索引鍵識別項子句。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause that was deserialized from the XML.
trans-unit.target: 已從 XML 還原序列化的金鑰識別項子句。

trans-unit.source: By default this method throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 依預設這個方法會擲回<xref:System.NotImplementedException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide the logic to deserialize a key identifier clause from XML.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法以提供的金鑰識別碼子句，從 XML 還原序列化邏輯。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes the specified XML to a token of the type processed by the derived class.

trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將指定字串還原序列化為該衍生類別所處理之類型的權仗。

trans-unit.source: This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。

trans-unit.source: For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the token.
trans-unit.target: XML 讀取器，其位於語彙基元的開始項目。

trans-unit.source: A token resolver that contains out-of-band and cached tokens.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Out-of-Band 及快取權杖的權杖解析程式。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes the XML referenced by the specified XML reader to a token of the type processed by the derived class by using the specified token resolver.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用指定的權仗解析程式，將指定 XML 讀取器所參考的 XML 還原序列化為權杖，此權杖的型別由該衍生類別處理。

trans-unit.source: The security token that was deserialized from the XML.
trans-unit.target: 已從 XML 還原序列化的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation ignores the `tokenResolver` parameter and delegates the call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會忽略`tokenResolver`參數和委派呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide the logic to deserialize a security token from XML.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法以提供安全性權杖從 XML 還原序列化邏輯。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you should also override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您也應該覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, in derived classes, if the method cannot deserialize the token from the referenced XML, it throws an <xref:System.Xml.XmlException>.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，在衍生類別中，如果方法無法還原序列化的語彙基元從參考的 XML，它會擲回<xref:System.Xml.XmlException>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of the security token that is processed by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得由這個執行個體處理的安全性權杖型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the security token that is processed by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體所處理安全性權杖的型別。

trans-unit.source: You must override this property in derived classes and return the <xref:System.Type> of the security token (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>) that is processed by the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須覆寫衍生類別中的這個屬性，並傳回<xref:System.Type>的安全性權杖 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>) 衍生類別處理。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.TokenType%2A> property to return the <xref:System.Type> of the security tokens that are processed by a custom handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.TokenType%2A>屬性，以傳回<xref:System.Type>自訂處理常式所處理的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼取自`Custom Token`範例。

trans-unit.source: This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。

trans-unit.source: For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The security token that is being validated.
trans-unit.target: 正在驗證的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The message to write to the trace.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入追蹤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Traces the failure event during the validation of security tokens when tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 當啟用追蹤時，在安全性權杖驗證期間追蹤失敗事件。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A> method when validation of the token fails.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A>方法語彙基元的驗證失敗時。

trans-unit.source: The token that was validated.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的權杖。

trans-unit.source: Traces the successful validation of security tokens event when tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 當啟用追蹤時，追蹤安全性權杖驗證成功事件。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A> method after the token has been successfully validated.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A>後權杖已成功驗證的方法。

trans-unit.source: The token to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的權杖。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, validates the specified security token.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，驗證指定的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The token must be of the type processed by the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 權杖必須是由衍生類別所處理的型別。

trans-unit.source: The identities contained in the token.
trans-unit.target: 包含在語彙基元中的識別。

trans-unit.source: By default this method throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 依預設這個方法會擲回<xref:System.NotImplementedException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A> method is called by the infrastructure to validate and extract the claims from the deserialized security token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A>驗證，並從已還原序列化的安全性權杖擷取宣告的基礎結構會呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: These claims are returned in the collection of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> objects returned by the method.
trans-unit.target: 這些宣告會傳回集合中的<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>方法所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: In the typical case, this collection will contain a single identity.
trans-unit.target: 在典型的案例中，這個集合會包含單一識別身分。

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, validation typically includes validating the intended audience specified in the token against the audience URIs specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.AudienceRestriction%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the token handler configuration object specified on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中，驗證通常包括驗證針對 Uri 中指定的對象在權杖中指定目標對象<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.AudienceRestriction%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性上指定的語彙基元處理常式組態物件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: These URIs are typically set in the configuration file under the [<audienceUris>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/audienceuris.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 這些 Uri 通常會在組態檔中設定為[ <audienceUris> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/audienceuris.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: If the audience cannot be validated, an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AudienceUriValidationFailedException> exception should be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法驗證對象，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AudienceUriValidationFailedException>應該擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When processing the token, the issuer is typically validated by passing the issuer token to one of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry.GetIssuerName%2A> methods on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry> object that is configured for the handler through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當處理語彙基元，藉由將簽發者權杖傳遞至其中一個通常驗證簽發者<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry.GetIssuerName%2A>方法<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry>已針對透過處理常式的物件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The issuer name registry is typically configured through the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者名稱登錄通常透過設定[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry.GetIssuerName%2A> returns the name of the issuer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry.GetIssuerName%2A>傳回簽發者名稱。

trans-unit.source: This name should be used to set the <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Issuer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in claims contained in the token.
trans-unit.target: 這個名稱應該用來設定<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Issuer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>權杖中包含的宣告中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the issuer name registry does not contain an entry for the issuer token, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry.GetIssuerName%2A> returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果簽發者名稱登錄未包含在簽發者的權杖的項目<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry.GetIssuerName%2A>傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: In this case a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException> is typically thrown in derived classes, but this behavior is up to the designer of the class.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>通常會擲回在衍生類別中，但這種行為是由類別的設計工具。

trans-unit.target: XML 寫入器。

trans-unit.target: 要序列化的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, serializes the specified key identifier clause to XML.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將指定的金鑰識別碼子句序列化為 XML。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause must be of the type supported by the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰識別項子句必須是衍生類別所支援的型別。

trans-unit.source: By default this method throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 依預設這個方法會擲回<xref:System.NotImplementedException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you should also override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method.
